mapper.update:
update brand b set
b.brandName=#{brand.brandName},
b.pinying=#{brand.pinying},
b.rate=#{brand.rate},
b.brandRate=#{brand.brandRate},
b.indexWord=#{brand.indexWord},
b.introduce=#{brand.introduce},
b.imgPath=#{brand.imgPath},
b.proImgs=#{brand.proImgs},
b.status=#{brand.status},
b.brandTypeIds=#{brand.brandTypeIds},
b.scanNum=#{brand.scanNum},
b.brandId=#{brand.brandId} where b.brandId=#{brand.brandId}
mapper.select: select brandId,brandName,proImgs,introduce,imgPath,scanNum,status,indexWord,rate,brandRate,pinying,brandTypeIds from brand order by pinying asc;

select b.brandId,b.brandName,b.proImgs,b.introduce,b.imgPath,b.status,b.indexWord,scanNum, b.rate,b.brandRate,b.pinying,b.brandTypeIds from brand b inner join brand_user bu on b.brandId=bu.brandId and bu.userId=#{userId} order by pinying asc;
select brandId,brandName,brandTypeIds,proImgs,introduce,imgPath,scanNum,status,indexWord,rate,brandRate,pinying from brand where status='1' and brandName=#{brandName}
